text: Odoyevsky (masculine), Odoyevskaya (feminine), or Odoyevksoye (neuter) may refer to: *Vladimir Odoyevsky (1803–1869), Russian philosopher and writer *Odoyevsky District, a district of Tula Oblast, Russia *Odoyevsky (rural locality), a rural locality (a settlement) in Tula Oblast, Russia *Odoyevskoye, a rural locality (a selo) in Kostroma Oblast, Russia *Odoyevsky family, an extinct Russian Rurikid princely family.
title: Odoyevsky
